Uses of Package
com.aware

Packages that use com.aware
com.aware   
 

Classes in com.aware used by com.aware
Accelerometer
          AWARE Accelerometer module - Accelerometer raw data - Accelerometer sensor information
Applications
          Service that logs application usage on the device.
Aware
          Main AWARE framework service.
Battery
          Service that logs power related events (battery and shutdown/reboot) - Battery changed - Battery charging - Battery discharging - Battery full - Battery low - Phone shutdown - Phone reboot
Bluetooth
          Bluetooth Module.
Communication
          Capture users' communications (calls and messages) events
ESM
          AWARE ESM module Allows a researcher to do ESM's on their studies Listens to: - ACTION_AWARE_QUEUE_ESM
Gravity
          AWARE Gravity module - Gravity raw data - Gravity sensor information
Gyroscope
          Service that logs gyroscope readings from the device
Light
          AWARE Light module - Light raw data - Light sensor information
LinearAccelerometer
          AWARE Linear-accelerometer module: A three dimensional vector indicating acceleration along each device axis, not including gravity.
Locations
          Location service for Aware framework Provides mobile device network triangulation and GPS location
Magnetometer
          AWARE Magnetometer module - Magnetometer raw data - Magnetometer sensor information
Mqtt
          Service that connects to the MQTT P2P network for AWARE
Network
          Service that logs available network status: - on/off events - Traffic throughput I/O
Orientation
          Service that logs orientation of the device using Sensor#TYPE_ORIENTATION
Pressure
          AWARE Pressure module - Pressure raw data in atmospheric pressure in hPa (millibar) - Pressure sensor information
Processor
          Service that logs CPU activity on the device
Proximity
          AWARE Proximity module - Proximity raw data in centimeters / (binary far/near for some sensors) - Proximity sensor information
Rotation
          AWARE Rotation module - Rotation raw data - Rotation sensor information
Screen
          Service that logs users' interactions with the screen - on/off events TODO: log touch events, coordinates, gestures
Telephony
          Telephony module.
Temperature
          AWARE Temperature module - Temperature raw data in ambient room temperature in degree Celsius - Temperature sensor information
Traffic
          Service that logs I/O traffic from WiFi, Bluetooth, mobile network
WiFi
          WiFi Module.
